text: This is a list of cricketers who play Twenty20 International cricket for Nepal. == Key == General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * * – Batsman remained not out * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * 50 – Number of half centuries * 100 – Centuries scored Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings made == Players == :Statistics are correct as of 30 August 2022.
